events.message: The policyholder reported a rear-end collision involving their vehicle last night on the highway. They are requesting to file a claim for the damages sustained.
The claim has been categorized under 'Auto Accident' after reviewing the initial report and vehicle damage description submitted by the customer.
An experienced claims agent was assigned promptly to handle the case and assist the policyholder throughout the claims process.
Acknowledgement of the claim has been sent to the customer including details about the next steps and documentation required.
The customer was asked to submit a police report, photos of the vehicle damage, and a repair estimate to process the claim further.
All requested documents including police report, vehicle photos, and repair estimates were received and reviewed for accuracy and completeness.
A formal investigation began to verify the details of the collision and to assess the liability and extent of damages reported by the claimant.
Investigation concluded with confirmation of damage severity and determination of fault based on police and witness statements.
A settlement offer was prepared and sent to the claimant covering repairs and rental car expenses as per policy coverage.
The customer responded positively to the proposed settlement, expressing satisfaction with the fairness and promptness of the offer.
Based on customer acceptance, the claim has been officially approved allowing payment and repair services to proceed.
The settlement payment was issued to the policyholderâ€™s account to cover all approved repair and related expenses.
The claim case has been closed after confirming repairs were completed and no further actions are required from the customer.
All case documentation and correspondence were securely archived for future reference and compliance purposes.
